A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With all of the excitement that The Last Jedi brings us from the constant feeling of being at the edge of our seats. Having a lot of duels between characters that fans have been waiting for\, having heartbreaking moments\, this movie really connects with the other Star Wars movie despite having completely different material and sending a new message to fans\, you don't have to be anyone well known to be special.
